Hello,

We run a free web hosting provider named VimlyHost, which actively supports hundreds of people including charities and students.

This post, will list our offerings and the reasons to host with us, and our contact information.

Our Offering :

Free Hosting Account

- 5GB RAID-10 SSD Storage
- 100GB Monthly Bandwdith
- Host 3 Websites
- 5 FTP Accounts
- 5 MySQL Databases
- 5 Email Accounts
- 3 Subdomains
- 0 Parked Domains
- No Activation Fees
- Around The Clock Support
- 99.9% Uptime Guarantee

Are you ready to start your free account? If so, you can register at https://VimlyHost.net. Otherwise, you are more than welcome to read the reasons you should host with us.

Why host with us?

5 Star Rated - With over 20 reviews of our service between Facebook and TrustPilot, all Rated At 5 Stars, you know our service is reliable.

Established - Our founders have over 20 years of combined experience in the web hosting industry. VimlyHost has being operating on a low profile since June 2016, when a closed beta took place.

Fast Servers - All Free Hosting Accounts are hosted on our super fast premium servers, with CloudLinux, to pervent resource hogging.

No Activation Fees - Our Primary Service is completely free, although we do offer a handful of low cost one-time Addons/Upgrades.

Host Multiple Websites - We are one of the only free hosting providers to allow you to host multiple websites on a single account. Not only this, you are allowed up to 3 Hosting Accounts.

Full Email Access - The only restriction on our emails is how many you are able to send on a daily basis, which is listed in the plan comparison page.

Website Builder - We provide the premium SitePad Website Builder for free on all our accounts, including free accounts.

cPanel Included - Wondering why we added the ‘All Rights Reserved’ logo next to the name ‘cPanel’? It’s because we actually use the paid web hosting control panel, named cPanel.

No Adverts - We don’t advertise on client websites, we never have, and we never will.

Around The Clock Support - We are not like most free hosting providers who take days to answer your tickets, or restrict you to support via forums only. We provide support though ticket to all clients and we aim to respond to tickets within 6 hours.

No File Size Limitations - We don’t limit file sizes on any of our plans. However, using our service as a file hosting platform will result in your account being suspended.

To order your free hosting account visit https://VimlyHost.net and signup.

If you have any questions about our services, you can contact us through Reddit, Facebook, Twitter, Email or Ticket at anytime.

Editor Notes

Manual Activation - Please create a ticket with the ‘Activation Team’ after ordering your account, to explain your websites purpose. Otherwise, we won’t be able to activate your account.

If your wondering how we can offer free hosting, please read our explanation attached below.

We have a number of partners that allow us to provide our free hosting, in return for advertisment of their paid services.

These advertisements are only placed on our website in the form of non-intrusive banners and third-party upgrade links. We do not currently advertise directly within cPanel, and we have no plans to advertise on clients websites.

In addition to these advertisements, most customers don't fully utilise the space provided to them, and although we can fully provision space for all customers, it's unlikely to occur.

Therefore, we can safely oversell our free services without effecting the performance of our services.
